No sense crying over spilled milk!

Posted in Kids, Pet, Products

If you've ever wanted a magic eraser, THIS IS IT!! Biokleen's BAC-OUT will take care of whatever you can throw at it and keep coming! Sick kiddos - DONE! Couch smells like dog - GOT IT! Accident last night - GOT THAT TOO!

[amazon template=iframe image1&asin=B005P0UYDS]This is basically your yuck eraser in a bottle for any of life's messes. This naturally derived spray uses live enzyme cultures to attack pet, food and beverage stains, organic waste, and odors until they're gone! With 4 kiddos and a dog the size of a horse, we use Bac-out constantly On pretty much every surface of our home!

mommyknowsbest seal of approval!
